name: 林尚德
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
一百學年度 語文測驗 教學進度表
Tentative Schedule:
week 1 Orientation / Warming up / 5 basic sentence patterns
week 2 time, tense, active and passive
week 3 Sense verbs & Causative verbs
week 4-5 Conditional & Subjunctive sentence
week 6-7 participial construction
week 8 inverted sentence
week 9 Midterm Exam
week 10-11 Adj. Clause & Auxiliary
week 12 N. Clause
week 13 Adv. Clause
week 14 Ving or to Vr.
week 15 TOEIC exam listening
week 16 TOEIC exam reading
week 17 TOEIC exam
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Marking Scheme:
Performance in class 30%
Quiz/Assignment/Exam 70%
materials:
Required Text:
S.T. Mind-mapping English,
TOEIC tactics
